homePage.tagline1: The world is built on ideas.
homePage.tagline2: We're shaping the world, one idea at a time.

solutions.title: SOLUTIONS
solutions.solutionsTitle: Building the Future of Türkiye, One Landmark at a Time
solutions.solutionsDescription: At GKS Yapı, we don't just build structures—we shape modern, sustainable, and high-quality living spaces that redefine city life. As a trusted leader in İstanbul's construction and real estate sector, we are committed to innovation, excellence, and long-term value for homeowners and investors alike.

timeline.title: Company Founded
timeline.description: GKS YAPI was established with a vision to transform urban landscapes

timeline.title: First Land Acquisition
timeline.description: Acquired our first development plot in Istanbul's emerging Beylikdüzü district

timeline.title: First Office Opened
timeline.description: Opened our first headquarters in the heart of Istanbul's business district

timeline.title: Initial Design Team
timeline.description: Assembled our core architectural and engineering team of industry veterans

timeline.title: First Major Project
timeline.description: Completed our first landmark residential tower in Istanbul

timeline.title: Quality Certification
timeline.description: Received ISO 9001 certification for our quality management systems

timeline.title: Expansion to Ankara
timeline.description: Extended our operations to Turkey's capital with a new regional office

timeline.title: Residential Innovation
timeline.description: Pioneered smart home technology in our mid-market residential developments

timeline.title: International Expansion
timeline.description: Expanded operations into European and Middle Eastern markets

timeline.title: Strategic Partnership
timeline.description: Formed partnership with European investment group for commercial projects

timeline.title: Technology Integration
timeline.description: Implemented BIM (Building Information Modeling) across all project phases

timeline.title: First Mixed-Use Development
timeline.description: Launched our first mixed-use project combining retail, office and residential spaces

timeline.title: Sustainability Initiative
timeline.description: Launched eco-friendly building practices across all projects

timeline.title: COVID-19 Response
timeline.description: Adapted construction protocols to ensure safety while maintaining project timelines

timeline.title: 100th Project Milestone
timeline.description: Celebrated the successful completion of our 100th construction project

timeline.title: Community Foundation
timeline.description: Established the GKS Foundation to support urban renewal in underprivileged areas

timeline.title: Design Excellence Award
timeline.description: Received international recognition for architectural innovation

timeline.title: Hospitality Sector Entry
timeline.description: Diversified into luxury hotel construction with our first five-star property

timeline.title: Future Vision
timeline.description: Pioneering smart building technology integration in all new developments

timeline.title: Research Partnership
timeline.description: Collaborated with leading universities on sustainable construction materials research

timeline.title: Corporate Headquarters
timeline.description: Inaugurated our new state-of-the-art headquarters building in Istanbul

timeline.title: Digital Transformation
timeline.description: Launched proprietary project management platform for enhanced client communication

timeline.title: Global Expansion Plan
timeline.description: Setting the foundation for expansion into Asian and North American markets

timeline.title: Carbon Neutrality Goal
timeline.description: Committed to achieving carbon-neutral construction practices by 2030
